node.title: Queensland records zero locally acquired COVID-19 cases as state inches towards 70pc double dose vaccine target
node.alt: Queensland Health Minister Yvette D'Ath speaks at a media conference.
node.description: Queensland records zero locally acquired cases of COVID-19 as residents on the Gold Coast are urged to continue coming forward for testing following unknown cases earlier this week.
node.content:
["Queensland has recorded zero\u00a0locally acquired cases of COVID-19.", "Health Minister Yvette D'Ath said Gold Coast residents were still urged to get tested as contact tracers sought the source of two local infections that emerged in the region earlier this week.", "It comes as the state inches closer to hitting the 70 per cent double-dose vaccination milestone.", "Just over 81.11 per cent of Queenslanders aged over 16 have now received at least one dose of a COVID-19 vaccine, while 69.39 per cent have had two.", "Ms D'Ath said the state was\u00a0expected to hit the target tomorrow or Monday, paving the way for people to enter from interstate hotspots.", "They must be fully vaccinated, arrive by air, have had a negative COVID-19 test within the previous 72 hours and undertake 14 days' home quarantine.", "Speaking from Bray Park State High School in the Moreton Bay region, Ms D'Ath said there were now 58\u00a0schools involved in the rollout of the vaccine.", "This weekend marks another 'super school' vaccination blitz in areas\u00a0across the state with lagging uptake.", "\"We've had three days in a row of more than 17,000 vaccinations,\" Ms D'Ath said.", "\"They've been such a success in the past and we'll have even more schools open next week.\"", "
'Long way to go'\u00a0for Gold Coast community
", "Meanwhile, authorities continue\u00a0to urgently investigate\u00a0the source of two unlinked cases detected on the Gold Coast earlier this week.", "Acting Chief Health Officer Peter Aitken said it was encouraging to see testing rates had doubled there in recent days.", "\"But there's still a long way to go,\" Dr Aitken said.", "\"Seventy\u00a0per cent is not the end goal.\u00a0We want to hit 80 per cent and we want to keep going.\"", "With Schoolies Week fast approaching and large crowds expected at\u00a0the Coolangatta Gold Surf Life Saving Ironman event\u00a0and Groundwater music festival at Broadbeach this weekend, authorities are particularly eager to drive up vaccination.", "Dr Aitken urged those attending events to wear\u00a0a mask.", "\"If you are in crowded places, particularly on the Gold Coast \u2026 when you can't socially distance, it is important to wear a mask,\" Dr Aitken said.", "Nineteen cases remain active across the\u00a0state after 9,212 tests were conducted in the past 24 hours.", "", "
How to take a rapid antigen test.
"]
